uniovi.assign.model

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniovi.assign.model.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class that represents a student that is enrolled in the school.

        public java.lang.String getStudentTimetable()
        Generates an ascii table containing the timetable of the student.
        Returns:
        an string that represents an ascii table containing the timetable of the student.

      • calculateNumberOfFreeHoursAndDaysWithLowNumOfClasses

        public int[] calculateNumberOfFreeHoursAndDaysWithLowNumOfClasses()
        Calculates the total number of half an hour free slots that the student have during all the week and the total number of days in which the student has only two hours of lessons or less.
        Returns:
        an array containing in index 0 the total number of free slots and in index 1 the total number of days with two hours of lessons or less.

      • getCompleteName

        public java.lang.String getCompleteName()
        Returns the name of the student with surnames.
        Returns:
        the complete name of the student.
